name.zh: 迷你多用途手机斜挎包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact mini crossbody designed for phone, cards, keys, and small essentials. Features a front quick-access pocket, zip-top main compartment, and adjustable strap—perfect for travel and everyday use. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 迷你手机斜挎包，适合收纳手机、卡包、钥匙等随身小物。前袋便于快取，主仓拉链闭合，肩带可调，日常与旅行都好用。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/挂钩/D 环等（可定制）

en.Use Case: Phone bag, travel mini bag, daily essentials
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, pockets, logo, lining, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 12–16cm × 高 18–22cm × 深 3–6cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 手机包/旅行小包/日常随身
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo、内里、拉链五金、包装
